00028 #ifndef _LIBCFS_TYPES_H
00029 #define _LIBCFS_TYPES_H
00030 
00031 #include <linux/types.h>
00032 
00033 #ifndef __KERNEL__
00034 # error This include is only for kernel use.
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 #if defined(_ASM_GENERIC_INT_L64_H)
00038 # define LPF64 "l"
00039 #elif defined(_ASM_GENERIC_INT_LL64_H)
00040 # define LPF64 "ll"
00041 #elif !defined(LPF64)
00042 # error "cannot define LPF64"
00043 #endif /* !LPF64 */
00044 
00045 #define LPU64 "%"LPF64"u"
00046 #define LPD64 "%"LPF64"d"
00047 #define LPX64 "%#"LPF64"x"
00048 #define LPX64i "%"LPF64"x"
00049 #define LPO64 "%#"LPF64"o"
00050 
00051 #define LPLU "%lu"
00052 #define LPLD "%ld"
00053 #define LPLX "%#lx"
00054 #define LPPID "%d"
00055 
00056 #if BITS_PER_LONG == 64
00057 # define LI_POISON ((int)0x5a5a5a5a5a5a5a5a)
00058 # define LL_POISON ((long)0x5a5a5a5a5a5a5a5a)
00059 # define LP_POISON ((void *)(long)0x5a5a5a5a5a5a5a5a)
00060 #elif BITS_PER_LONG == 32
00061 # define LI_POISON ((int)0x5a5a5a5a)
00062 # define LL_POISON ((long)0x5a5a5a5a)
00063 # define LP_POISON ((void *)(long)0x5a5a5a5a)
00064 #else /* BITS_PER_LONG == 32 */
00065 # error "cannot define L{I,L,P}_POISON"
00066 #endif /* BITS_PER_LONG != 32 */
00067 
00068 typedef unsigned long ulong_ptr_t;
00069 typedef long long_ptr_t;
00070 
00071 #endif /* _LIBCFS_TYPES_H */
